positions.subtitle: ANZ
positions.description: Drove efficiency in risk management (including identification and assessment) processes by developing integrative scalable solutions for all third-party relationships with ANZ, impacting 30k+ employees & stakeholders across 31 countriesProcess Improvement & Governance: Streamlined risk assessment processes by consolidating 8 tools into one, boosting efficiency by 60%. Developed comprehensive business process models for 30,000+ employees and created a process management playbook.Client-Centric Solutions & Stakeholder Management: Collaborated with 18 risk teams to gather and synthesize requirements, ensuring 100% coverage across 600+ features. Led user acceptance testing with a 90% satisfaction score, crafting over 100 test scripts and managing defect resolution.Leadership & Training: As Scrum Master, exceeded delivery expectations with a 75% score versus a projected 30%, leading a team of ~25. Conducted structured training sessions for new analysts, enhancing project knowledge and team methodologies.
positions.title: Business Analyst - Third Party Risk Management
positions.description_html:
Drove efficiency in risk management (including identification and assessment) processes by developing integrative scalable solutions for all third-party relationships with ANZ, impacting 30k+ employees & stakeholders across 31 countries

Process Improvement & Governance: Streamlined risk assessment processes by consolidating 8 tools into one, boosting efficiency by 60%. Developed comprehensive business process models for 30,000+ employees and created a process management playbook.

Client-Centric Solutions & Stakeholder Management: Collaborated with 18 risk teams to gather and synthesize requirements, ensuring 100% coverage across 600+ features. Led user acceptance testing with a 90% satisfaction score, crafting over 100 test scripts and managing defect resolution.

Leadership & Training: As Scrum Master, exceeded delivery expectations with a 75% score versus a projected 30%, leading a team of ~25. Conducted structured training sessions for new analysts, enhancing project knowledge and team methodologies.

positions.subtitle: ANZ
positions.description: Supported Group Technology in delivering the most valuable work at pace, providing visibility and transparency, and aligning the people, work, and investments to the bank's strategy.Enabling Data-Driven Decisions: Transformed reporting practices by visualizing 67% of work activities and 72% of the budget across the Tech division, improving work allocation. Established firm-wide reporting standards that enhanced reporting hygiene by 80% among 60+ stakeholders. Pioneered bottom-up linking of work with the company’s goals, raising Objectives & Key Results scores to 90%.Project Management & Stakeholder Engagement: Co-led strategic planning and implementation, achieving project delivery in under 2 months. Organized quarterly business reviews where 30+ technology leads showcased their deliverables to the CTO and COO, fostering alignment and transparency.Training & Onboarding: Served as the primary point of contact for onboarding 30+ tech areas to the new work reporting solution, facilitating knowledge transfer and training for the team across an additional 20+ areas.
positions.title: Business Analyst - Lean Portfolio Management
positions.description_html:
Supported Group Technology in delivering the most valuable work at pace, providing visibility and transparency, and aligning the people, work, and investments to the bank's strategy.

Enabling Data-Driven Decisions: Transformed reporting practices by visualizing 67% of work activities and 72% of the budget across the Tech division, improving work allocation. Established firm-wide reporting standards that enhanced reporting hygiene by 80% among 60+ stakeholders. Pioneered bottom-up linking of work with the company’s goals, raising Objectives & Key Results scores to 90%.

Project Management & Stakeholder Engagement: Co-led strategic planning and implementation, achieving project delivery in under 2 months. Organized quarterly business reviews where 30+ technology leads showcased their deliverables to the CTO and COO, fostering alignment and transparency.

Training & Onboarding: Served as the primary point of contact for onboarding 30+ tech areas to the new work reporting solution, facilitating knowledge transfer and training for the team across an additional 20+ areas.

positions.subtitle: ANZ
positions.description: Relentlessly improved the customer and developer experience for Group Tech's Enterprise Cloud Portfolio by embedding strong SRE practices and principles and championing data-driven decision-making.Data-Driven Decision-Making: Enhanced reporting processes by embedding cloud SRE principles, reducing manual efforts in incident and change request searches by approximately 50% through dynamic and automated systems.Centralized Decision-Making: Developed and implemented dashboards across 8 teams, facilitating informed decision-making for over 100 staff, including staffing incident managers effectively.Efficiency in Administration: As Scrum Master, improved turnaround time for administrative tasks by around 50% through streamlined planning ceremonies for a team of 10.
positions.title: Graduate Analyst - Site Reliability Engineering
positions.description_html:
Relentlessly improved the customer and developer experience for Group Tech's Enterprise Cloud Portfolio by embedding strong SRE practices and principles and championing data-driven decision-making.

Data-Driven Decision-Making: Enhanced reporting processes by embedding cloud SRE principles, reducing manual efforts in incident and change request searches by approximately 50% through dynamic and automated systems.

Centralized Decision-Making: Developed and implemented dashboards across 8 teams, facilitating informed decision-making for over 100 staff, including staffing incident managers effectively.

Efficiency in Administration: As Scrum Master, improved turnaround time for administrative tasks by around 50% through streamlined planning ceremonies for a team of 10.

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern, Epigamia

projects: [{"title":"Grads4Tech | Initiative by Graduates, ANZ","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jul 2022","description":"Co-led a project involving 20+ graduates and 5+ Tech Leads to improve Tech culture at ANZ; Initiated fortnightly newsletter series and completed proofs-of-concept for 3 projects"},{"title":"Propylene Glycol (PG) Plant Design | Course Project, Chemical Engineering IIT Bombay","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"- Awarded 2nd position out of 24 based on the business model, feasibility of production process, and economical plant scope- Co-led a team of 5 to develop a functional plant design for Propylene Glycol; Conducted market research, designed and simulated a PFD with optimal conditions, and achieved a 6-year payback period"},{"title":"MX TakaTak Case Study | Case-Cation, ShARE IIT Delhi","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"- Developed the growth strategy and business model for MX Takatak to capture market void created after the TikTok ban- Utilized Blue Ocean Strategy - ERRC Grid, Strategic Group Map, and Future Trend Value Curve to identify new market space"},{"title":"15-puzzle | C++ Course Project","start_date":"Apr 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"Applied A* Search algorithm to rearrange jumbled number tiles in least number of moves (15-puzzle solver)"}]
